tooltip.description: Opening Scene Detection does not recommend HLS Slice Output
Philips HDR requires an environment above CentOS 7.3 and installs Philips drivers
1.8K resolution only supports H265 < br > 2. Input or output is 8K resolution, and preprocessing can only choose CPU.

DRM system types are:1:PLAYREADY, 2:WIDEVINE, 4:FAIRPLAY

When used, it is filled in numerically separated by commas, such as "1,2"
